etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Много' ≈ 'viele'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Viele' се използва с броими съществителни: 'viele Bücher'. За неброими използвайте 'viel'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Малко' ≈ 'wenig'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Wenig' означава 'малко'; за множествено може да чуете 'wenige Leute'. Противоположно на 'viel/viele'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Всички' ≈ 'alle'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Alle' изисква множествено число: 'alle Freunde'. В комбинация с определителен член става 'alle die'.
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Няколко' ≈ 'einige'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Einige' обозначава неопределен малък брой: 'einige Tage' (няколко дни).
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Common Bulgarian word at A2 level. Useful for everyday communication
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Никой' ≈ 'keiner'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Keiner' е отрицателен заменящ за хора: 'Keiner kommt.' За съществителни използвайте 'kein' + род ('kein Auto').
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation
